title: Stealth Claus
logline: With Christmas cheer at an all time low, Santa must still deliver gifts, but without being caught by the vigilant residents
description: Made for the 2025 thatgamecompany x COREBLAZER Game Jam. The theme was "generosity" hence the Santa Claus based game in June. Worked with one friend and made the game in ~3 weeks. Created a tile based level editor in Unity, created 6 levels in this pixelated top-down 2D Adventure.
